Module com.cafe.group5a2
Package com.cafe.group5a2

Class ChefOrdersController

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.group5a2.ChefOrdersController
public class ChefOrdersController extends Object
Displays key information the chef needs about the customer and is able to click buttons to view order and update the database that an order has been completed
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cameron Turner, Adam Tucker

    • onClickReturnChefHome

      public void onClickReturnChefHome(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Returns void. This method changes the page to the chefs home page when a button is pressed
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Return to chef home button

    • setOrderID

      public void setOrderID()
      Returns void. This method sets the order ID label on the page with the table number If there is no order then a "No Order" label will be shown and the checkboxes will be removed

    • onClickCheckBoxOrder1

      public void onClickCheckBoxOrder1(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is used when a checkbox is clicked to notify the waiter the order is ready to be collected. The order is updated on the database
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - check box order 1 button
